title: Armies
description: A collection of stories featuring an unstoppable army and an indomitable hero, all amid the backdrop of barbaric, medieval lands as staggeringly bloody as they are beautiful.Featuring the writing of Jean-Pierre Dionnet (one of the founders of Métal Hurlant magazine) and the stunning art of Jean-Claude Gal (Diosamante), Armies is a true classic of Franco-Belgian Heroic Fantasy, large portions of which are available in the English language for the first time.Introduction by the author, Jean-Pierre Dionnet, and postafce by Pat Mills, Creator of 2000AD.
author: Jean-Pierre Dionnet
